articles.description: The O.E.C.D. expects the American economy will expand 6.5 percent this year, up sharply from a forecast of 3.2 percent in December.
articles.content: China, which contained the virus outbreak more quickly than the United States and other countries, will continue to benefit with growth of 7.8 percent forecast for this year. The government has poure… [+1654 chars]
